cleaned_text: Acupuncture has been used since ancient times as a part of traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) to relieve pain and symptoms from a variety of diseases in the body. It dates back 4,000 years, and focuses on treating the cause of disease and pain rather than the symptoms. Balancing the Qi We focus on balancing your Qi. Someone with imbalanced vital energy can start to develop a dysfunction of an organ system. If it is not treated, it will turn into a disease. We integrate the four components of TCM which are chiropractic and massage, herbology, and Qi Gong (mind and body) healing. How can acupuncture help? Acupuncture acts by stimulating nerves, connective tissues, and muscles. We believe it improves symptoms by boosting your body's natural painkillers as well as increasing blood flow to the affected areas. We integrate acupuncture harmoniously with chiropractic and applied kinesiology.
